title: Clone
desc:
Post 2148
- Choose any living player, may be yourself.
- Create an NPC Clone that starts with with the exact same cards and statuses as what the chosen player currently has.
- The Clone counts as a player for all intents and purposes, and is fully capable of winning (by default, it does not win with the player it was cloned from). It also calls Uno automatically when it ends its turn with one card left, but doesn't speak otherwise.
- The Clone's placement in the turn order is immediately after the player it was cloned from.
- After playing this, you may choose a card in your hand to give to the Clone.
